text: geuligo hananim-eun geudeul-ui jong-gyoe bunmyeonghan yejeung-eul jueoss-eudoe geu deul gaunde sigiwa jiltulo inhayeo geudeul-ege jisig-i ileulttae kkajineun uigyeon-eul dallihaji anihaessnola sillojunimkkeseo buhwal-ui nal geudeul-i uigyeon eul dallihaessdeon geos-e gwanhayeo simpan-eul hasilila
